summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.6°C) and outside temperature (down 5.8°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11649 lux) and cloud levels (up 720 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13389 lux) and cloud levels (up 1667 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 720.0m lower than yesterday, 651.2m lower than the past week, 1667.2m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1004.3m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1655.5m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and light levels will be low during the day. Changeable conditions.
